verses.verse: These are the journeys <WH4550> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, when they went forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by their hosts <WH6635> under the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>.

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> their goings out <WH4161> according to their journeys <WH4550> by the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>: and these are their journeys <WH4550> according to their goings out <WH4161>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, on the fifteenth <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>; on the morrow <WH4283> after the passover <WH6453> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went out <WH3318> with a high <WH7311> hand <WH3027> in the sight <WH5869> of all the Egyptians <WH4714>,

while the Egyptians <WH4714> were burying <WH6912> all their first-born <WH1060>, whom Jehovah <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> among them <WH430>: upon their gods also Jehovah <WH3068> executed <WH6213> judgments <WH8201>.
And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486>, and encamped <WH2583> in Succoth <WH5523>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Succoth <WH5523>, and encamped <WH2583> in Etham <WH864>, which is in the edge <WH7097> of the wilderness <WH4057>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Etham <WH864>, and turned back <WH7725> unto Pi-hahiroth <WH6367>, which is before Baal-zephon <WH1189>: and they encamped <WH2583> before <WH6440> Migdol <WH4024>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> from before <WH6440> Hahiroth <WH5265>, and passed through <WH5674> the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> into the wilderness <WH4057>: and they went <WH3212> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Etham <WH864>, and encamped <WH2583> in Marah <WH4785>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Marah <WH4785>, and came <WH935> unto Elim <WH362>: and in Elim <WH362> were twelve <WH8147> springs <WH5869> of water <WH4325>, and threescore and ten <WH7657> palm-trees <WH8558>; and they encamped there <WH2583>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Elim <WH362>, and encamped <WH2583> by the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>, and encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>, and encamped <WH2583> in Dophkah <WH1850>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Dophkah <WH1850>, and encamped <WH2583> in Alush <WH442>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Alush <WH442>, and encamped <WH2583> in Rephidim <WH7508>, where was no water <WH4325> for the people <WH5971> to drink <WH8354>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rephidim <WH7508>, and encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, and encamped <WH2583> in Kibroth-hattaavah <WH6914>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kibroth-hattaavah <WH6914>, and encamped <WH2583> in Hazeroth <WH2698>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Hazeroth <WH2698>, and encamped <WH2583> in Rithmah <WH7575>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rithmah <WH7575>, and encamped <WH2583> in Rimmon-perez <WH7428>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rimmon-perez <WH7428>, and encamped <WH2583> in Libnah <WH3841>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Libnah <WH3841>, and encamped <WH2583> in Rissah <WH7446>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Rissah <WH7446>, and encamped <WH2583> in Kehelathah <WH6954>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kehelathah <WH6954>, and encamped <WH2583> in mount <WH2022> Shepher <WH8234>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from mount <WH2022> Shepher <WH8234>, and encamped <WH2583> in Haradah <WH2732>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Haradah <WH2732>, and encamped <WH2583> in Makheloth <WH4722>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Makheloth <WH4722>, and encamped <WH2583> in Tahath <WH8480>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Tahath <WH8480>, and encamped <WH2583> in Terah <WH8646>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Terah <WH8646>, and encamped <WH2583> in Mithkah <WH4989>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Mithkah <WH4989>, and encamped <WH2583> in Hashmonah <WH2832>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Hashmonah <WH2832>, and encamped <WH2583> in Moseroth <WH4149>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Moseroth <WH4149>, and encamped <WH2583> in Bene-jaakan <WH1142>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Bene-jaakan <WH1142>, and encamped <WH2583> in Hor-haggidgad <WH2735>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Hor-haggidgad <WH2735>, and encamped <WH2583> in Jotbathah <WH3193>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Jotbathah <WH3193>, and encamped <WH2583> in Abronah <WH5684>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Abronah <WH5684>, and encamped <WH2583> in Ezion-geber <WH6100>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Ezion-geber <WH6100>, and encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> (the same is Kadesh <WH6946>).
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Kadesh <WH6946>, and encamped <WH2583> in mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>, in the edge <WH7097> of the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>.

And Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> went up <WH5927> into mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> at the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and died <WH4191> there <WH705>, in the fortieth year <WH8141> after the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were come out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320>, on the first day of the month <WH259>.
And Aaron <WH175> was a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died <WH4194> in mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>.

And the Canaanite <WH3669>, the king <WH4428> of Arad <WH6166>, who dwelt <WH3427> in the South <WH5045> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, heard <WH8085> of the coming <WH935> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023>, and encamped <WH2583> in Zalmonah <WH6758>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Zalmonah <WH6758>, and encamped <WH2583> in Punon <WH6325>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Punon <WH6325>, and encamped <WH2583> in Oboth <WH88>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Oboth <WH88>, and encamped <WH2583> in Iye-abarim <WH5863>, in the border <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Iyim <WH5864>, and encamped <WH2583> in Dibon-gad <WH1769>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Dibon-gad <WH1769>, and encamped <WH2583> in Almon-diblathaim <WH5963>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from Almon-diblathaim <WH5963>, and encamped <WH2583> in the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim <WH5682>, before <WH6440> Nebo <WH5015>.
And they journeyed <WH5265> from the mountains <WH2022> of Abarim <WH5682>, and encamped <WH2583> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho <WH3405>.
And they encamped <WH2583> by the Jordan <WH3383>, from Beth-jeshimoth <WH1020> even unto Abel-shittim <WH63> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho <WH3405>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH5674>, When ye pass over the Jordan <WH3383> into the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>,

then ye shall drive out <WH3423> all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you <WH6>, and destroy all their figured <WH4906> stones <WH6>, and destroy all their molten <WH4541> images <WH6754>, and demolish <WH8045> all their high places <WH1116>:
and ye shall take possession <WH3423> of the land <WH776>, and dwell <WH3427> therein <WH5414>; for unto you have I given the land <WH776> to possess it <WH3423>.

And ye shall inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> by lot <WH1486> according to your families <WH4940>; to the more <WH7227> ye shall give the more <WH7227> inheritance <WH5159>, and to the fewer <WH4592> thou shalt give the less <WH4591> inheritance <WH5159>: wheresoever the lot <WH1486> falleth <WH3318> to any man <WH4294>, that shall be his; according to the tribes of your fathers <WH1> shall ye inherit <WH5157>.

But if ye will not drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> from before <WH6440> you <WH3498>, then shall those that ye let remain of them be as pricks <WH7899> in your eyes <WH5869>, and as thorns <WH6796> in your sides <WH6654>, and they shall vex <WH6887> you in the land <WH776> wherein ye dwell <WH3427>.
And it shall come to pass <WH1819>, that, as I thought to do <WH6213> unto them <WH6213>, so will I do unto you.
